segments.pli: Saṃyutta Nikāya 22
segments.en: Linked Discourses 22

segments.pli: 3. Bhāravagga
segments.en: 3. The Burden

segments.pli: 26. Assādasutta
segments.en: 26. Gratification

segments.pli: Sāvatthinidānaṃ.
segments.en: At Sāvatthī.

segments.pli: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
segments.en: “Mendicants, before my awakening—when I was still unawakened but intent on awakening—I thought:

segments.pli: ‘ko nu kho rūpassa assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇaṃ?
segments.en: ‘What’s the gratification, the drawback, and the escape when it comes to form …

segments.pli: Ko vedanāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇaṃ?
segments.en: feeling …

segments.pli: Ko saññāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇaṃ?
segments.en: perception …

segments.pli: Ko saṅkhārānaṃ assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇaṃ?
segments.en: choices …

segments.pli: Ko viññāṇassa assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇan’ti?
segments.en: and consciousness?’

segments.pli: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, etadahosi:
segments.en: Then it occurred to me:

segments.pli: ‘yaṃ kho rūpaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ rūpassa assādo.
segments.en: ‘The pleasure and happiness that arise from form: this is its gratification.

segments.pli: Yaṃ rūpaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, ayaṃ rūpassa ādīnavo.
segments.en: That form is impermanent, suffering, and perishable: this is its drawback.

segments.pli: Yo rūpasmiṃ chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ, idaṃ rūpassa nissaraṇaṃ.
segments.en: Removing and giving up desire and greed for form: this is its escape.

segments.pli: Yaṃ vedanaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ vedanāya assādo.
segments.en: The pleasure and happiness that arise from feeling …

segments.pli: Yaṃ vedanā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, ayaṃ vedanāya ādīnavo.
Yo vedanāya chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ, idaṃ vedanāya nissaraṇaṃ.
Yaṃ saññaṃ paṭicca uppajjati … pe …
segments.en: perception …

segments.pli: yaṃ saṅkhāre paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ assādo.
segments.en: choices …

segments.pli: Yaṃ saṅkhārā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, ayaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ ādīnavo.
Yo saṅkhāresu chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ, idaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ.
Yaṃ viññāṇaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ viññāṇassa assādo.
segments.en: consciousness: this is its gratification.

segments.pli: Yaṃ viññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, ayaṃ viññāṇassa ādīnavo.
segments.en: That consciousness is impermanent, suffering, and perishable: this is its drawback.

segments.pli: Yo viññāṇasmiṃ chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ, idaṃ viññāṇassa nissaraṇaṃ’.
segments.en: Removing and giving up desire and greed for consciousness: this is its escape.’

segments.pli: Yāvakīvañcāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ evaṃ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ nābbhaññāsiṃ, neva tāvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, ‘sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ.
segments.en: As long as I didn’t truly understand these five grasping aggregates’ gratification, drawback, and escape in this way for what they are, I didn’t announce my supreme perfect awakening in this world with its gods, Māras, and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans.

segments.pli: Yato ca khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ evaṃ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ;
segments.en: But when I did truly understand these five grasping aggregates’ gratification, drawback, and escape in this way for what they are, I announced my supreme perfect awakening in this world with its gods, Māras, and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans.

segments.pli: athāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti paccaññāsiṃ.
Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādi:
segments.en: Knowledge and vision arose in me:

segments.pli: ‘akuppā me vimutti; ayamantimā jāti; natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
segments.en: ‘My freedom is unshakable; this is my last rebirth; now there are no more future lives.’”

segments.pli: Pañcamaṃ.

suttaplex.blurb: Before his awakening, the Buddha investigated the aggregates in terms of their gratification, drawback, and escape.
